AbilityTemplate.Name: {=dart_label_str}Magic Bolt
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Hurl a magical bolt at the enemy. The missile homes in on the target and does 40 damage in a 3 meter radius on contact.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=ward_of_arrows_label_str}Ward of Arrows
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=ward_of_arrows_description_str}Adds 40% physical resistance against ranged damage for 15 seconds to the caster.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=minor_heal_label_str}Petty Heal
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=minor_heal_description_str}Heals the caster for 3 health every second for 7 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=foetid_cloud_label_str}Foetid Cloud
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=foetid_cloud_description_str}A sickly short ranged poisonous gas cloud.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=enchant_weapon_label_str}Enchant Weapon
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=enchant_weapon_description_str}Buff a target ally's weapon to do additional magic damage.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=aura_of_resistance_label_str}Aura of Resistance
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=aura_of_resistance_description_str}Allies in a 3 meter radius gain 20% physical resistance for 15 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=strength_of_combat_label_str}Strength Of Combat
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=strength_of_combat_description_str}Adds 20% physical damage bonus for 15 seconds to the caster.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=dust_storm_label_str}Dust Storm
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=dust_storm_description_str}Dry winds from the desert knock down victims and apply minor damage.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=fireball_label_str}Fireball
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=fireball_description_str}There is nothing quite as welcoming as a fireball to the face. Deals 70 damage in a 6 meter radius and burns the foes for 5 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=cinder_blast_label_str}Cinder Blast
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=cinder_blast_description_str}Hurl fragments of solidified lava at the enemy dealing medium damage on contact.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=bolt_of_aqshy_label_str}Bolt of Aqshy
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=bolt_of_aqshy_description_str}A fast moving flaming bolt that does medium damage on impact.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=sear_label_str}Sear
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=sear_description_str}Blast the enemy with a short ranged searing flame attack that does medium damage.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=cascading_fire_cloak_label_str}Cascading Fire-Cloak
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=cascading_fire_cloak_description_str}The caster wraps himself in a cloak of magical flame that shields him from physical (20%) and fire (70%) damage for 30 seconds. The cloak also reflects a portion of damage taken in melee.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=flaming_swords_label_str}Flaming Sword of Rhuin
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=flaming_swords_description_str}Buff the weapons of allies in a 15 meter radius with the Flaming trait for 45 seconds. The weapons burst into fire and burn every enemy they strike.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=burning_head_label_str}The Burning Head
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=burning_head_description_str}Conjure a large burning skull that moves forward burning everything in its path.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=flame_storm_label_str}Fire Tornado
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=flame_storm_description_str}A randomly moving pillar of searing flame is summoned on the battlefield. Flesh and skin melt, while bones turn to ash.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=lightning_bolt_label_str}Lightning Bolt
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=lightning_bolt_description_str}Hurl an electric bolt at the enemy that does medium damage on impact.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=wind_blast_label_str}Wind Blast
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=wind_blast_description_str}A gust of wind knocks down victims and applies minor damage.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=chain_lightning_label_str}Chain Lightning
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=chain_lightning_description_str}A ball of lightning that zaps enemies in its area for medium damage.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=harmonic_convergence_label_str}Harmonic Convergence
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=harmonic_convergence_description_str}Divining favorable signs, the caster guides the minds of his fellow warriors. Allies in a 10 meter radius gain 50% physical resistance for 50 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=blizzard_label_str}Iceshard Blizzard
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=blizzard_description_str}Stormy clouds loom over the area showering those below with sharp shards of ice.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=comet_of_casandora_label_str}Comet of Casandora
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=comet_of_casandora_description_str}A large meteor strikes the area killing all below in a giant shockwave.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=thunderbolt_label_str}Urannon's Thunderbolt
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=thunderbolt_description_str}A single large bolt of lightning crashes down from the skies with a sizeable electric charge.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=curse_of_midnight_wind_label_str}Curse of the Midnight Wind
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=curse_of_midnight_wind_description_str}The wizard speaks an ancient three-word hex, cursing the enemies and iposing a 40% penalty to movement and attack speed, as well as damage dealt.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=shem_gaze_label_str}Shem's Burning Gaze
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=shem_gaze_description_str}A bolt of cleansing energy fly from the caster's hands, searing evil wherever it strikes.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=healing_light_label_str}Healing Light
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=healing_light_description_str}Allies in the area of effect regenerate health over time.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=pha_protection_label_str}Pha's Protection
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=pha_protection_description_str}The wizard calls upon the beneficent Guardian of Light to protect his allies from harm. Grants 50% physical resistance for a duration 50 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=deathly_shards_label_str}Deathly Shards
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=deathly_shards_description_str}Sharp shards of light fly towards the target piercing through the toughest armor.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=radiance_pillar_label_str}Pillar of Radiance
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=radiance_pillar_description_str}A large pillar of light applies high damage to those caught in the beam.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=radiant_gaze_label_str}Radiant Gaze
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=radiant_gaze_description_str}Columns of light rise from the ground in a path.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=net_of_amyntok_label_str}Net of Amyntok
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=net_of_amyntok_description_str}The wizard conjures an arcane net in the selected area. Any foe caught in the spell is halted for 25 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=bironas_timewarp_label_str}Birona's Timewarp
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=bironas_timewarp_description_str}Slows down time, while units around you move unhindered.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=nagash_gaze_label_str}Gaze of Nagash
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=nagash_gaze_description_str}A bolt of Dhar flies from the caster's eyes, and what flesh it touches blackens and withers, peeling away completely to reveal bleached white bone beneath.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=summon_skeleton_label_str}Raise the Dead
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=summon_skeleton_description_str}Raises old bones from the ground for the Necromancer to command. Summon 25 Skeleton Warriors.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=shadowblood_label_str}Shadowblood
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=shadowblood_description_str}Shadowy orbs of blood follow the target staining the ground beneath every step of the way. Deals damage in a medium area.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=morkharn_label_str}Morkharn - Breath of Darkness
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=morkharn_description_str}The wizard draws tendrils of the Wind of Death to restore his minions and fill them with unholy vigour. Heals allies over time in a radius.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=vanhelsdansemacabre_label_str}Vanhel's Danse Macabre
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=vanhelsdansemacabre_description_str}The animated dead are normally ungainly and cumbersome; this spell, however, gives them grace and speed - and makes them all the more deadly as a result.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=wind_of_death_label_str}Wind of Death
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=wind_of_death_description_str}Invoke the spirits of the dead to consume the souls of the living. Applies medium damage while moving along its path.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=grave_call_label_str}Grave Call
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=grave_call_description_str}Drawing forth the dark energy coursing through the land, the necromancer searches long dead bodies to answer his summons. Raise 25 Grave Guard.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=curse_of_years_label_str}Curse of Years
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=curse_of_years_description_str}The necromancer utters an ancient curse, which causes the foe to age at a horrific rate. Reduces enemy attack and movement speed by 50% for a duration of 30 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=chillwind_label_str}Chillwind
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=chillwind_description_str}The caster assails the enemy with a freezing gale.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=doom_bolt_label_str}Doom Bolt
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=doom_bolt_description_str}The wizard rips open the sky and calls down a bolt burning with dark flames on the foe.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=death_spasm_label_str}Death Spasm
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=death_spasm_description_str}A crackling black bolt of energy that explodes in a fireball and sets victims on fire.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=soul_rain_label_str}Soul Rain
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=soul_rain_description_str}A black cloud looms over the targeted area striking those below with arcane lightning bolts.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=power_of_darkness_label_str}Power of Darkness
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=power_of_darkness_description_str}The caster draws unstable power from the Realm of Chaos to empower his allies. Grants 20% physical bonus damage for a duration of 35 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=screaming_skull_label_str}Screaming Skull
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=screaming_skull_description_str}Conjures a screaming skull dripping with acid that moves forward damaging everything in its path.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=black_horror_label_str}Arnzipal's Black Horror
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=black_horror_description_str}The caster tears down the walls between realities, and a black cloud of roiling energy sweeps across the battlefield. As the darkness travels, slimy tentacles lash out from its depths, draggin unfortunate victims screaming to an unknown fate.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=soul_stealer_label_str}Soul Stealer
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=soul_stealer_description_str}Enemies affected experience a soul draining damage over time effect, causing them to take 12 damage every second for a duration of 12 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=apotheosis_label_str}Apotheosis
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=apotheosis_description_str}The wizard infuses and invigorates his allies with pure magical energies.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=fiery_convocation_label_str}Fiery Convocation
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=fiery_convocation_description_str}Utter one secret word, and your foes shall burst with fire and flame. Deals large damage as well as damage over time in the area.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=soul_quench_label_str}Soul Quench
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=soul_quench_description_str}A brilliant sphere of light emerges from the wizard's fingertips. Enemies affected suffer medium damage.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=courage_of_aenarion_label_str}Courage of Aenarion
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=courage_of_aenarion_description_str}The Elf mage channels all eight Winds of Magic and invokes the name of Aenarion, the first of Phoenix Kings. Allies around the wizard strike with greater frequency.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=curse_of_arrowattraction_label_str}Curse of Arrow Attraction
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=curse_of_arrowattraction_description_str}The Mage places a curse in the area - the air around enemies distorts and guides allied projectiles with astounding accuracy.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=tempest_label_str}Tempest
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=tempest_description_str}Conjures a brilliant vortex of shimmering light containing all eight colors of Winds of Magic.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=shield_of_saphery_label_str}Shield of Saphery
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=shield_of_saphery_description_str}The caster summons an ethereal dome to protect his allies from ranged fire.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=dwellers_below_label_str}Dwelllers Below
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=dwellers_below_description_str}Tendrils emerge from the ground reaching out and attacking enemies in the area. Knocks down, dismounts and slows (80%) enemies, while dealing 10 damage per second for 15 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=the_green_eye_label_str}The Green Eye
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=the_green_eye_description_str}Caster merges their eyes, firing a single fast, penetrating projectile in the aimed direction.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=barkskin_label_str}Barkskin
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=barkskin_description_str}Hardens the skin of targets, making them tougher, providing 50% physical resistance for 80 secouds

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=summer_heat_label_str}Summer Heat
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=summer_heat_description_str}A small area radiates unbearable heat, causing fatigue, impairing movement speed by 50%, and making the enemies slightly vulnerable to fire damage for 15 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=regrowth_label_str}Regrowth
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=regrowth_description_str}Invoking the name of Duthandor, lord of the ancient wildshrines, the wizard mends wounds and broken bones of his comrades. Allies in a 3 meter radius gain 5 HP per second for 12 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=drain_life_label_str}Drain Life
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=drain_life_description_str}Sucks the moisture and fluids from the foe, dealing 5 damage per second for total duration of 10 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=storm_of_renewal_label_str}Storm of Renewal
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=storm_of_renewal_description_str}Raw energy flows across the battlefield, renewing lost vigour and mending wounds. Heals 30 hitpoints flat, and 10 hitpoints of all friendly targets inside the area for 12 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=barkskin_label_str}Shield of Thorns
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=shieldofthorns_description_str}Prickly gorse protects allies in the radius. Reflects 25% of incoming melee damage.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=amber_spear_label_str}Amber Spear
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=amber_spear_description_str}The caster throws a javelin like amber spear in the targeted direction that penetrates multiple targets.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=tangling_thorn_label_str}Tangling Thorn
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=tangling_thorn_description_str}Roots erupt from the ground preventing all enemies from moving for a duration of 10 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=panns_impenetrable_pelt_label_str}Pann's Impenetrable Pelt
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=panns_impenetrable_pelt_description_str}A magical skin surrounds the wizard, protecting him from physical damage (40%) for a duration of 40 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=hail_storm_label_str}Hail Storm
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=hail_storm_description_str}A storm of stones falls down on the foe, dealing physical damage in a radius.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=flock_of_doom_label_str}Flock Of Doom
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=flock_of_doom_description_str}Summons a nightmare of crows in the targeted area. Affected enemies suffer light damage over time and their physical resistance is reduced by 20% for 10 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=the_beast_unleashed_label_str}The Beast Unleashed
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=the_beast_unleashed_description_str}Unleashes the primal savagery of the caster's allies, driving them into a frenzy. Grants a 25% physical damage and attack speed bonus for a duration of 60 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=curse_of_anraheir_label_str}Curse Of Anraheir
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=curse_of_anraheir_description_str}Woodland sprites hinder all enemies caught in the area for 15 seconds, reducing movement (35%) and attack speed (50%) as well as causing 3 damage per second.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=quicksilver_swords_label_str}Quicksilver Swords
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=quicksilver_swords_label_str}Infuses weapons of allies with gleaming energies - Even a rusty sword turns deadly with the help of a Metal Wizard. Friendly units deal 20% magic and fire damage for a duration of 60 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=gleaming_arrow_label_str}Gleaming Arrow
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=gleaming_arrow_description_str}The Gold Wizard fires a projectile of golden energy out of his forehead. The missile homes in on the target and deals 100 physical damage.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=meteoric_ironclad_label_str}Meteoric Ironclad
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=meteoric_ironclad_description_str}Allies are protected by an enchantment of iron and silver. Provides 60% physical resistance for a duration of 45 seconds

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=plague_of_rust_label_str}Plague Of Rust
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=plague_of_rust_description_str}At a flick of the caster's wrist, the armor of foes is consumed by rust. Imposes a 70% physical resistance penalty for a duration of 120 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=gehennas_golden_globe_label_str}Gehennas Golden Globe
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=gehennas_golden_globe_description_str}A glittering globe of energy engulfs and burns foes alive. Those unfortunate enough to survive are also slowed down for a short duration.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=final_transmutation_label_str}Final Transmutation
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=final_transmutation_description_str}By weaving the brilliant Wind of Chamon, the wizard attempts to transmute his foes into statues of pure gold. Deals continuous damage and greatly slows down enemies.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=gehennas_golden_hounds_label_str}Gehennas Golden Hounds
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=gehennas_golden_hounds_description_str}The wizard calls forth a pair of massive golden hounds that travel in a circular motion.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Greater Harbinger
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Summon a champion on the target location.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=mindcontrol_label_str}Mind Control
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=shadowblood_description_str}Shadowy orbs of blood fly towards the target staining the ground beneath every step of the way.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Blast of Agony
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=fireball_description_str}Launch a devastating blast of agony.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Arrow of Kurnous
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=fireball_description_str}Launch a devastating homing arrow.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Wrath of the Wood
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Summon dryads on the target location.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Fey Paths
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: The Damsel wanders on the fey paths. Instantly teleports the player to the targeted ground position. Charges with dealt or healed damage by magic.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=regrowth_label_str}Regrowth
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=regrowth_description_str}Invoking the name of Duthandor, lord of the ancient wildshrines, the wizard mends wounds and broken bones of his comrades. Allies in a 3 meter radius gain 5 HP per second for 12 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=comet_of_sigmar_label_str}Comet of Sigmar
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=comet_of_sigmar_description_str}You throw a fiery missile that takes the form of Sigmars famed twin-tailed comet. A comet of Sigmar is a holy missile dealing 30 damage. It can knock units down, or throw them off horse. Only affects enemies

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=healing_hand_label_str}Healing Hand
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=healing_hand_description_str}Allies in a 5 meter radius gain 5 Healthpoints every 2 seconds for 9 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=armor_of_righteousness_label_str}Armour of Righteousness
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=armor_of_righteousness_description_str}Allies in a 3 meter radius gain 35% physical resistance for 8 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=vanquish_label_str}Vanquish
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=vanquish_description_str}Buff the weapons of allies in a 5 meter radius with the Flaming trait for 20 seconds. The weapons burst into fire and burn every enemy they strike.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=armor_of_righteousness_label_str}Ulric's Gift
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=armor_of_righteousness_description_str}The wolf-priest lets out a mighty howl and dedicates the kill to Ulric. Gain +30% movement and attack speed for 25 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=armor_of_righteousness_label_str}Heart of The Wolf
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=armor_of_righteousness_description_str}The priest's allies are driven into a zealous frenzy. Friendly troops in a 10 meter radius gain +35% physical damage as well as Unbreakable and Unstoppable for 20 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=armor_of_righteousness_label_str}Ice Storm
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=armor_of_righteousness_description_str}The wolf-priest summons an icy hailstorm within an area. Enemies suffer a -50% movement and attack speed penalty as well as damage over time.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=armor_of_righteousness_label_str}The Snow King's Decree
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=armor_of_righteousness_description_str}The priest roars with a grand prayer and calls freezing blast of blue flames to cleanse a targeted area of cowards and weaklings. Affected enemies take damage, suffer a -50% movement and attack speed penalty as well as damage over time.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=aerial_shield_label_str}Aerial Shield
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=aerial_shield_description_str}Power of the Lady causes enemy missiles to vanish mid-air. Grants 90% ranged physical resistance in a radius.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=aura_of_the_lady_label_str}Aura Of The Lady
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=aura_of_the_lady_description_str}The Lady protects Damsels and their followers from harm. Grants 80% magic, lightning and fire resistance in a radius.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=shield_of_combat_label_str}Shield Of Combat
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=shield_of_combat_description_str}The Lady's divine power causes allies' armor to deflect enemy blows. Grants 50% physical resistance in a radius.

AbilityTemplate.Name: {=ladys_favour_label_str}Lady's Favour
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: {=ladys_favour_description_str}The Damsel conjures a vision of the Lady of the Lake to guide Bretonnians into the frey. Grants 25% attack speed bonus in a radius.
